statements: SELECT * FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility;
SELECT id, waste_type, quantity FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration';
SELECT storage_location, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility GROUP BY storage_location;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY storage_location DESC;
SELECT id, storage_location, waste_type FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE disposal_method = 'Deep Burial' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT storage_location, quantity FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE waste_type = 'Radioactive' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE storage_location LIKE '%Yucca Mountain%' AND disposal_method = 'Encapsulation' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, quantity, disposal_method FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE storage_location LIKE '%Underground%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, waste_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE storage_status='Ready';
SELECT procedure_name, disposal_site, cost FROM disposal_procedures WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT id, method, completion_date FROM disposal_procedures WHERE method='Incineration' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY waste_type ASC
SELECT procedure_name, method, cost FROM disposal_procedures WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND storage_status = 'In Stock'
SELECT waste_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY waste_type
SELECT procedure_name, disposal_site, completion_date FROM disposal_procedures WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT item_name, storage_location FROM inventory WHERE id < 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_types WHERE hazard_level >= 3;
SELECT type_name, classification FROM waste_types WHERE classification = 'chemical';
SELECT procedure_name, disposal_site FROM disposal_procedures WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, storage_location FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT type_name, hazard_level, classification FROM waste_types WHERE hazard_level > 3 ORDER BY hazard_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_procedures WHERE disposal_site = 'Landfill' AND details LIKE '%hazardous%';
SELECT id, procedure_name, disposal_site FROM disposal_procedures WHERE LENGTH(details) > 200;
SELECT id, type_name, classification FROM waste_types WHERE type_name IN ('Plastic', 'Glass') ORDER BY classification;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT waste_name, proper_disposal_method FROM waste_types WHERE hazardous = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM disposal_procedures WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT waste_name, hazardous, proper_disposal_method FROM waste_types WHERE hazardous = true;

SELECT facility_name, location, SUM(disposed_quantity) AS total_disposed FROM facilities INNER JOIN disposal_procedures ON facilities.facility_id = disposal_procedures.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name, location;
SELECT facility_name, waste_name, quantity FROM facilities INNER JOIN inventory ON facilities.facility_id = inventory.facility_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY waste_type ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE facility_name = 'Facility A';
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, storage_location FROM inventory WHERE waste_type = 'Hazardous Waste';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE waste_type='Plastic' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT facility_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, type_name FROM facilities f JOIN waste_types wt ON f.facility_name = wt.type_name WHERE f.location='New York';
SELECT procedure_name, description FROM disposal_procedures WHERE description LIKE '%safe%' ORDER BY procedure_name ASC;
SELECT id, facility_name, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal WHERE facility_id=1 AND disposal_date>'2022-01-01';
